column5: Anyone know of any guides on this lake in Ontario near Thunder Bay / Upsala? Looking for a one-day trip July 18th or 19th for two adults (M & F). Any suggestions would be appreciated. Thanks in advance.SWT
Give a call to the folks at one of the resorts - Open Bay, Pine Point or Thunderbird. They'll be able to thelp you out.Great lake for Walleye, decent Northern Pike and LOTS of Bass.Blair

Make the drive a little bit farther west. The fishing is far better in the Ignace/sioux lookout area. I used to fish lac years ago but would never consider going back. Generally small fish and fairly high pressure for nw Ontario.
